Values.ServiceBus__ListenConnectionString: <service bus connection string for shared service bus with listener permissions>
Values.ServiceBus__ManageConnectionString: <connection string for shared service bus with manage permissions>
Values.ServiceBus__SendConnectionString: <connection string for shared service bus with sender permissions>
Values.EdiInbox__QueueName: <Name of queue where incoming messages to EDI from other subsystems are placed>
Values.WholesaleInbox__QueueName: <Name of queue where EDI place messages to wholesale>
Values.IncomingMessages__QueueName: <Name of queue where incoming messages to EDI from EDI are placed>
Values.IntegrationEvents__TopicName: <Name of topic where integration events are received>
Values.IntegrationEvents__SubscriptionName: <Name of the service bus topic subscription for aggregation result notifications>
